Published Books

Three fundamental works in the field of fiscal economics, tax administration and special regimes.

View on Google Books

Value Added Tax

Economic, technical and legal analysis

Ricardo Fenochietto

Buenos Aires: La Ley, 2001

A comprehensive 923-page treatment of the value-added tax (VAT), covering economic concepts, technical frameworks, and legal implications. Includes in-depth analysis of its structure, incidence, and fiscal effects in Latin America.

Google Books Astrea
View on AbeBooks

Public Sector Economics

Comprehensive analysis of public finance and its effects

Ricardo Fenochietto & Silvia Guadalupe Catinot

Buenos Aires: La Ley, 2006

A wide-ranging examination of public sector economics, exploring how government policies, revenue collection, and spending affect fiscal stability and economic outcomes.

AbeBooks Buscalibre
View at UBA

Simplified Regime for Small Taxpayers

Theoretical and practical analysis

Ricardo Fenochietto

Osmar D. Buyatti, Librería Editorial, Argentina, 1999

A theoretical and practical examination of Argentina's simplified tax regime (Monotributo) for small taxpayers. Explores its economic effects, comparative legislation, taxable events, entry and exit conditions, and implications for social security funding.

University of Buenos Aires
